targets.query: SELECT last("usage_system") + last("usage_user") + last("usage_iowait") + last("usage_nice") + last("usage_steal") + last("usage_irq") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("load1"), 10s) FROM "system" WHERE "host" = 'ip-10-0-102-172' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" = 'ip-10-0-102-172' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
